website_summaries.verdict: This neck pillow has a strap on the back to fit comfortably on your head rest for neck support.
pros: Elastic strap stays secure and makes pillows easy to place
Ergonomic style helps support the neck well
Comes as a 2 pack of pillows
cons: These pillows all have some kind of cartoon or kid-ish drawing on them

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but was too small for my car seat
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute neck support for a car. Extremely soft and I am sure for many cars it would be perfect for support. I have a BMW X5 and it was just too small I guess for that car seat. If it had been bigger it would have been perfect for me. I wish I could give it 5 stars because I am sure it works well for many car seats, however it did not work for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O

customer_reviews.title: Gave as aGift
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to a friend as a gift, but she had a hard time fitting them to her car. But now she uses as display pillows in the living room so anyone can use it as a comfort pillow.
customer_reviews.author: sigmond

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and quality
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun to have and yes they are comfortable ! Love them so much ! Great quality as well:)!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hai

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than other neck pillows I got. But it works
customer_reviews.author: Rawr

customer_reviews.title: they look good
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable for the neck, good quality, they are not uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Damwx77

customer_reviews.title: Snoopy NExk Support Great Product & Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable in the car! I have received many compliments about the comfort. And they look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Speedreader

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and look so cute! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, and the item cam from China, the product is great quality, I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: EcuaBSC

customer_reviews.title: Super cute pillows I needed something for the traffic
customer_reviews.text: Super cute pillows I needed something for the traffic. Not sure if its really worth 20$ I've seen cheaper options, smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Toscano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for those times when you have a bit of neck fatigue! Adjust to any height.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Good Headset!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and Lovely Garfield but i will give 5 if the size could be 25% larger than now ~
customer_reviews.author: Bo Gu
